product_name: Royal Robbins Discovery Bermuda Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When you want more coverage for either sun protection or modesty in travel situations, wear the women's Royal Robbins Discovery Bermuda Shorts with their 12 in. inseam. Nylon/spandex blend is soft and stretchy with a subtle texture; resists wrinkles and dries quickly, too. Fabric offers UPF 50+ sun protection, great for hiking or travel in hot, sunny climes. Mesh-lined pockets: 2 front and 2 zippered rear. Quick-drying mesh lining inside waistband; logo snap at front closure. Royal Robbins Discovery Bermuda Shorts feature dyed-to-match topstitching and a regular fit. Closeout.
short_description: When you want more coverage for either sun protection or modesty in travel situations, wear the women's Royal Robbins Discovery Bermuda Shorts with their 12 in. inseam.
